remarks: Law of contradiction for orthoposets.  ( ~ chocin analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2011.)
statement:
opnoncon.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
opnoncon.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
opnoncon.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
opnoncon.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
opnoncon $p |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B ) -> ( X ./\ ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = .0. ) $.
